text: Va cun mu'minon on guruhhoro didand, ki atrofi Madinaro ihota kardaand, ʙa jod ovardand, ki nusrati Alloh nazdik ast, guftand: In hamon cizest, ki Alloh va Pajomʙaras ʙa mo va'da dodaast; az imtihon va mehnat va nusrat, rost guftaand va in ʙa onon cuz ʙa imon va taslimason najafzud. Ja'ne imonason ʙa Alloh va amalason ʙa farmudahoi U zijod gast
